page.title: 12My toys
page.content: I like to play with my lego which is a cnstructional toy made of plastic bricks which I can make into all sorts of models. It has wheels and some of it allows me to gear my model in connection with an electric motor. My sister's favourite toy is called 'My Little Pony'. It only consists of a little plastic horse with a long pink mane which she combs endlessly with the comb provided. The current craze is to buy anything so long as it has a picture of Thomas the Tank Engine on it. I have pocket money each week amounting to 55 pence whereas some of my friends have as much as two pounds fifty. I spend some money on my toys and on sweets but most of my toys come at birthday time or at Christmas.
